Class Crud_graph

public class Crud_graph
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
Contains all the crud operation that could be done on Neo4J.

      public boolean createRelationFollow​(java.lang.String taster_name1, java.lang.String taster_name2)

      Parameters:
      taster_name1 - : user's name that want to follow someone;
      taster_name2 - : user's name that will be followed from taster_name1.
      Returns:
      result: indicates if the operation has been done successfully.

      Parameters:

      taster_name2 - : user's name that will not have anymore taster_name1's follow.

      result: indicates if the operation has been done successfully.
